title: Super Star Shooter
summaries: The Super Star Shooter is a Hardmode ranged weapon that launches Fallen Stars and is a direct upgrade to the Star Cannon. The stars shot from the item summon an extra projectile upon contact with an enemy, hitting them again, similar to the Influx Waver.
